Have stopped playing this game since few months ago. It has problems in many aspects: 
[list]
    [*]Fewer and fewer fun chases and mind games.
    [*]A single match often end under 6 minutes, or even faster. I have no idea what I'm playing.
    [*]MMR system is not doing its job. There are always obvious gaps in skills among players either when played solo or as a killer.
    [*]It probably could take you an hour or longer waiting for next match as a survivor, but only a few seconds as a killer.
    [*]Not much variety. Meta perks, gen rushing, tunneling and hook camping happen again and again, 9 out of 10 matches.
    [*]The Hit Validation favors players from countries with low ping, it should be weighted based on ping value to be REAL fair if you have not enough budget for deploying more dedicated server.
    [*]Survivors got used to SWF, relying on voice calls, usually have poor concept in terms of decisions and act as low-skilled in solo queue. (Except for those good at both solo and SWF)
    [*]Killers' strength are poor balanced. E.g. The Nurse vs The Legion.
    [*]Cheaters and hackers are more flagrant these days, showing that the reporting system exists in name only.
[/list]
I enjoyed DBD when it was fun, but not anymore.
There are definitely more things to list, but I'm tired.

Played 1220 hours at time of doing this review, surprised i never reviewed sooner. Good game, it's very punishing early on because of MMR and matchmaking and perks can be very meta but overall fun solo or with mates whichever side you play.

Dead by Daylight will test the strength of your relationships on a level unseen since Mario Kart. If your friendship can survive picking off your friends one by one until only one remains, only for you to slam the hatch door shut in front of them and watch the last sliver of hope drain from their beady little eyes before you hunt them down like wolf toying with a wounded fawn, then your bond is unbreakable.
killers to op get camped and tunneled

you know, I really  hate this game but i cant stop playing it. I haven't been outside since. I've lost all contact with the outside world just to get face camped by a blood thirsty mutant crow i have ever seen. I get told to uninstall and die about 10 times a day on average.  I rate this game 10/10

I love the amount of time I gave to this game, its so fun doing it with friends and its amazing to express sheer excitement and fear at the same time, the mmr is kinda bad due to high ranked vs low ranked imbalance but apart from it, everything is just fine, from the roaster of killers to the groups of survivors, perks, items, add-ons etc.

The game is very entertaining both alone as a killer and as a team as a survivor. I just have one piece of advice for all you new players or those thinking of buying this.... ignore imaginary rules. Enjoy the game how you want, with the way you want to play.

Actually a shit game. The devs have completely ruined the match making system and made every killer useless unless you do some meta ass build. They listened to the survivor mains and nerfed every killer making many of them not usable unless youre trying to take seven showers and change your clothes 4 times after a single game. Truly a dogshit game and isnt worth the money.

Every time I open this game I am filled with such anguish. It digs my depression deeper. This game is the exact definition of insanity; doing the same action over and over expecting a different outcome. Every game I load into I think maybe, just maybe, that the killer won't be an a-hole. But I am always proven wrong. And yet here I am. re-opening the game every night after work.
